weekly_top_story.headline: FDA Approves First-of-Its-Kind Alzheimer's Drug
weekly_top_story.summary: The FDA's approval of lecanemab marks a significant advancement in Alzheimer's treatment, offering a potential disease-modifying therapy and raising hopes for future treatments.

stories.headline: New CDC Guidelines on Antibiotic Stewardship Released
stories.summary: The CDC issued updated guidelines emphasizing responsible antibiotic use to combat antimicrobial resistance, impacting prescribing practices and patient care.
stories.source: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention

stories.headline: Major Hospital System Announces Merger
stories.summary: Two large hospital systems are merging, potentially leading to significant changes in regional healthcare access, cost, and service offerings.

stories.headline: AI-Powered Diagnostic Tool Shows Promise in Early Cancer Detection
stories.summary: A new study demonstrates the potential of AI to significantly improve the accuracy and speed of cancer diagnosis, leading to earlier interventions and better patient outcomes.
